solution_line_template: There are {school_days_per_week} school days in a week: {school_days_per_week} days/week x {containers_per_day} containers of milk/day = {containers_per_week} containers of milk every week

Finally the number of container for {num_weeks} weeks is {num_weeks} weeks x {containers_per_week} containers/week = <<{num_weeks}*{containers_per_week}={total_containers}>>{total_containers} containers
